attributes.action: If Trump is making a state visit don't use the tax payers money to fund it
attributes.additional_details: It will cost £10 million of tax payer's money to fund a state visit, the money could be spent on the nhs, education or many other useful essentials that are struggling in the current climate.
attributes.background: If Donald Trump is to make a state visit to the UK, do not fund it by the taxpayer's money. Millions of people have made it very clear that they are outraged by Trump and his racism and bigotry, it is more than unfair to fund his visit by the people's money.
